entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers or thunderstorms. High 17. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers or thunderstorms. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 80 near thunderstorms. High 17. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers or thunderstorms. Low plus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers or thunderstorms changing to 30 percent chance of showers near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 80 near thunderstorms this evening. Wind becoming light near midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Saturday 10 September 2016
